name: COMPO: Flying Aces — Going the Distance!
name_original: COMPO: Flying Aces — Going the Distance!
description:
Greetings, Pilot! Can you go the distance? Fly your biplane as far as you can. Be on the lookout for fuel drops delivered by parachute!

Entry for Ludum Dare 39 Compo theme "Running out of power"

Ludum Dare entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/flying-aces-going-the-distance

Made with Godot Engine 2.1. Source code: https://github.com/jotson/ld39

I've never package an executable for Windows or OSX before. Please let me know if it doesn't work for you!
